Name: Creator
Text: Thank you for playing. To continue, press "k".

Name: Stranger
Text: It must be terrible to be trapped,

Name: Stranger
Text: Well... seems like someone or something broke your cell gate. So, go.

Name: Stranger
Text: Godspeed. Good luck. Break a leg, whatever.

Name: Stranger
Text: For the sake of both of us, don't ever give up.

Name: Stranger
Text: If you remember that, I trust you'll make it out of here.

Name: Stranger
Text: What, who am I? Just a disembodied voice.

Name: Stranger
Text: Just know that I'll be watching over you. I'll help you along the way, but I can't guarantee your survival.
